name: Twirl! 2.7D Biker Edition
description:
[v.1 Was made before the time limit, v.2, 3 seconds before and v.3, 1 minute after for correcting a minor bug]

Twirl upon your enemies!

-Directional key to move (W,A,S,D / Z,Q,S,D / Arrows)

-Left click to shoot.

-Right click to do a boomerang attack behind you!

-Another Knight may help you during the fight!

-Escape to exit the game.

-M to change the music!

The musics was made by me with https://beepbox.co/
All asset are free and most of them can be found here! https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii for the 2D tileset.

And https://maxparata.itch.io/ Max Parata for the voxel objects!

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame The theme was Alternate Perspectives!
